subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Australian midfielder Tim Cahill has signed as a high-priced designated player with Major League Soccer’s Red Bulls after a frustrating season in which he scored just two league goals for Everton in England.
snippet: The Australian midfielder Tim Cahill has signed as a high-priced designated player with Major League Soccer’s Red Bulls after a frustrating season in which he scored just two league goals for Everton in England.
